title: Japanese leaders praise Sri Lanka’s progress
content: By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Deputy Prime Minister of Japan, Taro Aso called on the Sri Lankan President, Mahinda Rajapaksa on Wednesday (13) afternoon during his four day official visit to Japan. Defence Minister of Japan, Itsunori Onodera also met with the President just after the conclusion of the Japanese deputy premier’s meeting…
